entries.title: Key tax breaks left out of funding bill, clouding their future
entries.description: Efforts to expand the child tax credit and avoid losing a prized business tax break have been left out of the end-of-year funding bill, putting their future in doubt.

entries.title: Lawmakers are donating Bankman-Fried’s campaign contributions — who and where
entries.description: After FTX’s collapse, some lawmakers quickly donated campaign contributions from the company’s disgraced founder Sam Bankman-Fried to a wide array of charities.
